text: Fritz Honegger (25 July 1917 - 4 March 1999) was a Swiss politician. He was elected to the Swiss Federal Council on 7 December 1977. He served until Rudolf Friedrich took the position on 31 December 1982. He was member of the Free Democratic Party. During his time in office he held the Federal Department of Economic Affairs and was President of the Confederation in 1982. ==Other websites== * Category:Presidents of the Swiss Confederation Category:Members of the Federal Council (Switzerland) Category:1917 births Category:1999 deaths Category:Weinfelden District Category:People from Thurgau
title: Fritz Honegger
